name: unmoving
content:
unmoving adjective
(NOT MOVING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not moving: His body was still and unmoving, his gaze fixed. He was oblivious to everything else in the world but her. How many of us have sat in a line of unmoving cars next to an empty bus lane?
More examplesFewer examplesThe boy was frozen in place, unmoving. Now she lies unmoving, breath shallow and silent, lost to the world.He was now feeling like a man with claustrophobia trapped in a packed and unmoving elevator.

unmoving adjective
(NO EMOTION)
not making you feel any emotion: He stars in a strangely unmoving biopic of the star. Against my expectations, I found the funeral service unmoving.
More examplesFewer examplesThe site of the disaster is a strangely unmoving spectacle now that it's been cleared of 1.6 million tons of debris. This was an impressive but unmoving performance from the orchestra.Her romance with a Russian emigre in colonial Shanghai is exciting yet strangely unmoving.
